"Defeat any $(0) you find!

"Relieve the other Arks and
cooperate to subdue the enemy!"

"/face2 Great work! You've really got
the hang of this teamwork thing!"

"What a mess. We'll
retrieve the wounded."

"Your coordination is suffering.

"That Arks can't handle this alone.

should you fail again."

"Seems you've got backup. Work
together to exterminate the targets.

"I see you have the knack! You're

working together like that!"

"Ugh, here we go again.

"You're not coordinating properly.

"That ARKS burden is really weighing

"Everyone, this Arks is your partner!

"/face2 Good job! You make
such a great team!"

"Well, these things happen!
We'll pick them up, so don't

"Ummm... Your coordination
isn't so good... Please try

"It's getting a bit too much for

"救援人員の到着を確認。
協力して目標のDefeatを。"

"目標のDefeatを確認。
見事な連携でした。"

"救援人員、戦闘不能。
こちらで強制回収します。
通常任務へお戻りください。"

"協力が不十分かと。

"対象のアークスの負担が大きく

"味方が救援に来てくれました！

"対象のアークスはこちらで回収します！

"協力中のアークスの負担が大きいです！

"協力中のアークスへの負担が大きく
